description: Episode of Series "Our Vanishing Wilderness". Shows what is happening to Pyramid Lake, in Nevada, and its wild life because dams divert its source of water and sonic booms frighten its wild life. Based on the book "Our vanishing wilderness" by Mary Louise and Shelly Grossman and John Hamlet, 1969.
